analyzed: dug dang khrag dang nyung kar skye tshhe dang /_/d+ha du ra dang til mar rnams/_/

analyzed: bcing ba rnams/_/bsgrub pa'i dus su rdzogs par bya/_/che ge mo'i ming ling du

analyzed: tshi te phyung /_/ma ra ya srog la thun/_ces pa nyi shu rtsha gcig bri/_/thab khung

translated: Dig a pit in the hearth.🔽The time of summoning is the time of practice on the eighth day of the month.🔽Twenty-one is the definite number.

original: dgu stong nyi phyed nam phyed la/_/bsreg pa'i dus su bstan pa yin/_/
analyzed: dgu stong nyi phyed nam phyed la/_/bsreg pa'i dus su bstan pa yin/_/
translated: The time of burning is taught to be at midnight on the ninth day.

original: me sbar me pra smon pa dang /_/me pra brtag dang me lha bskyed/_/mchod
analyzed: me sbar me pra smon pa dang /_/me pra brtag dang me lha bskyed/_/mchod
translated: The fire is lit, the fire is blessed, the fire is examined, and the fire god is generated.

original: pas mchod a bsreg rdzas dbul/_/gnag pa'i rdzas btums bstab par bya/_/
analyzed: pas mchod a bsreg rdzas dbul/_/gnag pa'i rdzas btums bstab par bya/_/
translated: The fire god is worshipped with offerings, and the burnt offerings are presented.🔽The black substances are wrapped up and given to the fire god.

original: bstod dang gsol btab gshegs su gsol/_/sra bkrol gdong pa khrag gis byug_/
analyzed: bstod dang gsol btab gshegs su gsol/_/sra bkrol gdong pa khrag gis byug_/
translated: The praise is offered, the request is made, and the fire god is asked to leave. The face is smeared with blood.🔽The seat is abandoned, the knees are placed on the ground, and black clothes are worn.

original: stan spangs pus btshugs gos nag bgo/_/dur khrod ras dang tshhil chen la/_/
analyzed: stan spangs pus btshugs gos nag bgo/_/dur khrod ras dang tshhil chen la/_/
translated: The fire is generated on a cloth from a charnel ground or a great corpse.🔽The fire is lit from the southern corner.🔽“Bhaya na jvala jvala hūṃ.”

original: me bskyed lho'i zur nas sbar/_/b+ha ya na dza la dza la hum/_las 'di myur du
analyzed: me bskyed lho'i zur nas sbar/_/b+ha ya na dza la dza la hum/_las 'di myur du
translated: If this rite is quickly accomplished,🔽the color of the fire will be dark red and blazing,

original: 'grub pa na/_/me mdog dmar nag 'tshher ba dang /_/me lce rno la 'tshher ba
analyzed: 'grub pa na/_/me mdog dmar nag 'tshher ba dang /_/me lce rno la 'tshher ba
translated: the flames will be sharp and blazing,🔽and the smoke will go like an arrow.

original: dang /_/du ba mda' ltar 'gro bar shog_/ji ltar smon pa bzhin byung na/_/
analyzed: dang /_/du ba mda' ltar 'gro bar shog_/ji ltar smon pa bzhin byung na/_/

analyzed: me'i ltas ni bzang ba yin/_/de las bzlog na ngan pa yin/_/
translated: If it is the opposite, it is bad.

original: me'i nang du kam dmar nag las ni/_/srin po mdog phyag mtshhan sku ltar bsam mo/_/
analyzed: me'i nang du kam dmar nag las ni/_/srin po mdog phyag mtshhan sku ltar bsam mo/_/

analyzed: 'bar ba bskyed par bya/_/spyi bor reg tshhig lha dgu bskyed/_/ye shes pa la
translated: invite the awareness beings,🔽and make offerings of all the offering substances

analyzed: dgug bzhug bya/_/mchod pa'i rdzas ni thams cad kun/_/rim pa bzhin du

analyzed: dbul bar bya/_//b+ha ya na sa ni tra sa ni/_dza la rag sha ma ra pra kam arnam swa ha/

analyzed: pus pe/_du pam/_d+hi pam/_g+han sgo ni bi te/_mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad

analyzed: nas/_/lan grangs nyi shu re re dbul/_/bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad

analyzed: kun/_/dgra bo'i sha dang khrag du bsam/_/kun nas lan grangs gong bzhin

analyzed: dbul/_/b+ha ya na sa ni tra sa ni/_dza la rag sha ma ra pra kam/_che ge mo'i srog

analyzed: la thun ma ra ya phat/_rang gi mdun gyi ling kha ni/_/mtshhon gyis nyi shu rtsha
translated: Cut the effigy in front of you🔽twenty-one times with the weapon.🔽Along with each name of the effigy,

analyzed: gcig gtub/_/ming gi ling kha re re dang /_/bcas pa rngam pa'i zhal du

analyzed: ra ya rbad srog thun la rbad/_tshi ta/_ma sa/_rag ta/_go ro tsha na/_ba

analyzed: bstod pa gtor chog nas tshhul bzhin bstod par bya/_/'dod pa'i don kun gsol
